title: Newick's Lobster House Lunch Offer
description: Lunch special at Newick's Lobster House. Get $2.50 back when you spend $15 or more on lunch items.

content.restaurant_description: Newick's Lobster House is a seafood restaurant serving Lunch Bay Scallops ($16.00), Lunch Calamari ($14.00), Lunch Chicken Tenders ($13.00), Lunch Strips ($17.00), Lunch Coconut Shrimp ($16.00), Lunch Fantail Shrimp ($16.00), Lunch Gulf Shrimp ($15.00), Lunch Filet of Haddock ($20.00), Lunch Haddock Nuggets ($15.00), Lunch Sea Scallops ($33.00), Lunch Whole Clams ($32.00), Fish & Chips ($16.00), Bay Scallop Roll ($15.00), Cheeseburger ($16.00), Cap'n Burger ($17.00), Chicken Salad Sandwich ($12.00), Chicken Sandwich Broiled ($14.00), Chicken Sandwich Fried ($14.00), Clam Roll ($37.00), Fish Tacos ($16.00), Grilled Cheese ($8.00), Haddock Sandwich Broiled ($17.00), Haddock Sandwich Fried ($17.00), Hamburger ($15.00), Lobster Roll Petite ($34.00), Lobster Roll Original ($40.00), Lobster Roll Jumbo ($44.00), Shrimp Roll ($15.00), Tuna Melt on Panini ($12.00), Veggie Burger ($14.00) and more. Open 11:00 am - 7:30 pm. Located in 431 Dover Point Rd, Dover, NH 03820.

restrictions: Valid for dine-in and takeout orders
Cannot be combined with other offers

attribution.instructions: Upload your receipt after dining to receive your bounty
